amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $90 million from the ACA navigator program to the National Institute of Mental Health.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to transfer $90 million from the ACA navigator program to the National Institute of Mental Health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 237, 1 Present (Roll no. 284).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 237, 1 Present (Roll no. 284).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Hill (AR).
